Setup a socket, bind the host and port, listen and accept a connection and then close the connection.","solution":"","canShowSolution":false},{"name":"Client Setup","content":"Create a new python file which will be the client. Connect to the server, then close the connection. 

To run both programs simultaneously:
1.	Open Terminal
2.	Navigate to the directory of your cserver using cd
3.	Press command-N to create a new terminal window
4.	Navigate to the directory of your client using cd
5.	Run the server script using python3 filename.py
6.	Run the client script in the other window using python3 filename.py
7.	The client should connect to the server and both programs will finish running.
You cannot run both programs using IDLE, use terminal!
